typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		AddressID as integer,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		StateProvince as string,
		CountryRegion as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['Sales/SalesOrderHeader.parquet']) ~> SrcSalesOrderHeader
source(output(
		AddressID as integer,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		StateProvince as string,
		CountryRegion as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['Sales/SalesOrderDetail.parquet']) ~> SrcSalesOrderDetail
